summary: The module implements a collection of reusable PyTorch building blocks for constructing one‑dimensional UNet architectures. It provides down‑sampling, up‑sampling, residual, and self‑attention layers, as well as mid‑network and output modules, enabling flexible assembly of encoder‑decoder models for temporal data processing in diffusion or related generative tasks.
business_intent: To give developers a ready‑made toolkit for rapidly prototyping and deploying 1‑D UNet‑style networks, especially for diffusion models and time‑series generation, by supplying modular, interchangeable components that handle resolution changes, residual learning, and attention mechanisms.
